about.name: Constant Suchet
about.heading: About
about.p1: Since childhood, I have always loved creating things with computers. Surrounded by computers and video games like Roblox and Minecraft, I discovered my first development experiences in a playful way.
about.p2: Before finishing high school, I turned this passion into concrete projects: I created a Fiverr account and met the needs of over 50 clients by developing Roblox games. Today, I also work on websites as part of my studies, while continuing to create software and technical projects.
about.p3: I gradually became interested in reverse engineering and cybersecurity. Among my projects, I developed MessageX, an end-to-end encrypted messaging app, and explored reverse engineering to understand and modify certain games. I also undertook a mini MMORPG to challenge myself on network and server aspects.
about.p4: Finally, with a colleague from IUT, I launched Chronosync, a project aimed at tracking screen time and deriving insights from it; it is currently on pause as I focus on my student projects and learning.
